```{r test2}
USA <- Data[Data$CountryCode == 'USA', ]
USA <- USA[USA$RegionCode == '', ]
USA$Date <- as.Date(as.character(USA$Date),
                        format = '%Y%m%d')
USA$ConfirmedDeaths[is.na(USA$ConfirmedDeaths)] <- 0
plot(USA$Date, USA$ConfirmedDeaths, pch=".")
ggplot(USA, aes(x = Date, y = ConfirmedDeaths)) + geom_point()
```
